function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on indoor air quality and ventilation in green buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation and air filtration systems, conducting indoor air quality assessments","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purification technology","People":"Occupants of green buildings, visitors, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building designers, facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate waste management in green buildings","Impact":"Risk of attracting pests and creating breeding grounds for disease vectors","Mitigation":"Implementing effective waste disposal systems, regular waste audits, pest monitoring","Technologies":"Smart waste management systems, waste-to-energy technology","People":"Occupants of green buildings, waste management personnel","Owner":"Building managers, waste management service providers"},{"Description":"Insufficient attention to occupant behavior and hygiene in green buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of person-to-person disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing hygiene promotion programs, providing education on disease prevention, maintaining cleanliness and sanitation protocols","Technologies":"Smart sensor technology, interactive health monitoring systems","People":"Occupants of green buildings, visitors, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building managers, health and safety officers"}]}
